CustomField.formula: CASE ( Percent_Complete_Score__c , 20, "1 - Estimate Delivered (1 of 5)", 40, "2 - Estimate Accepted (2 of 5)", 60, "3 - Work Completed (3 of 5)", 80, "4 - Final Acceptance (4 of 5)", 100, "5 - Submitted for Billing (5 of 5)", "0 - Not started (0 of 5)")
CustomField.label: Checklist Step
